class.name: UtilityAIBTRepeatUntil
class.description: The RepeatUntil node ticks its child either until the expected_tick_result is returned by its child or [member max_repeat_times]. If [member max_repeat_times] is set to -1, only the expected_tick_result will end the loop.

members.member: The result that the child node should return to end the loop. Can be either -1=Failure, 0=Running or 1=Success.
The maximum times the limiter node can be ticked.
